text: @AndrewYang Is a Movement the only thing we can do? Gov't has obviously failed us. Leaders fear @realDonaldTrump he is not one, I won't accept these officials lying for him. #DumpTrump can't keep #coronavirus out of the @WhiteHouse so have no hope! The #racist rhetoric & refusal to recognize
